part 5.question: polite equivalent of あのひと

part 6.question: ladies and gentlemen, all of you

part 7.question: Mr., Ms. (title of respect added to a name)

part 8.question: (suffix often added to a child's name instead of ~さん)

part 9.question: (suffix often added to a boy's name)

part 10.question: (suffix meaning "a national of"; e.g., アメ)

part 11.question: teacher, instructor (not used when referring to one's own job)

part 15.question: employee of ~ Company (used with a company's name; e.g., IMC のしゃいん)
